name: Unpublish
author: Doug Wollison

sections.description:
Unpublish is a very simple plugin that does one simple thing: it adds a button to the Edit Post screen.

This button will appear on published posts/pages/etc, which on click will save the post as pending rather than keeping it published.

Usage Documentation

Click the button if you no longer want the post published.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the contents of unpublish.tar.gz to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
Details on each release can be found on the GitHub releases page for this project.

1.0.0

Initial public release.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the contents of unpublish.tar.gz to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

short_description: Adds a one click "Unpublish" button to the WordPress edit screen; switches the status to pending.
